content.value:
I turn 38 next week, with a handful of miscarriages under my belt. Not quite the position I thought I'd find myself in but here we are. Life is (mostly) good, I'm healthy, I have amazing friends & family. It still hurts from time to time (1/)

#WorldChildlessWeek
